name: R4B-Timing-R5-Timing
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Timing into FHIR R5

element.display: A timing schedule that specifies an event that may occur multiple times

target.display: A timing schedule that specifies an event that may occur multiple times
target.comment: R4B `Timing` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing`

element.display: BID | TID | QID | AM | PM | QD | QOD | +

target.display: C | BID | TID | QID | AM | PM | QD | QOD | +
target.comment: R4B `Timing.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.code`

element.display: When the event occurs

target.display: When the event occurs
target.comment: R4B `Timing.event` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.event`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `Timing.extension` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `Timing.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Timing.modifierExtension` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.modifierExtension`

element.display: When the event is to occur

target.display: When the event is to occur
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat`

element.display: Length/Range of lengths, or (Start and/or end) limits

target.display: Length/Range of lengths, or (Start and/or end) limits
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.bounds[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.bounds[x]`

element.display: Number of times to repeat

target.display: Number of times to repeat
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.count` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.count`

element.display: Maximum number of times to repeat

target.display: Maximum number of times to repeat
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.countMax` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.countMax`

element.display: mon | tue | wed | thu | fri | sat | sun

target.display: mon | tue | wed | thu | fri | sat | sun
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.dayOfWeek` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.dayOfWeek` - dayOfWeek has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/days-of-week|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/days-of-week|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: How long when it happens

target.display: How long when it happens
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.duration` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.duration`

element.display: How long when it happens (Max)

target.display: How long when it happens (Max)
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.durationMax` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.durationMax`

element.display: s | min | h | d | wk | mo | a - unit of time (UCUM)

target.display: s | min | h | d | wk | mo | a - unit of time (UCUM)
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.durationUnit` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.durationUnit` - durationUnit has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/units-of-time|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/units-of-time|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.extension` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.extension`

element.display: Event occurs frequency times per period

target.display: Indicates the number of repetitions that should occur within a period. I.e. Event occurs frequency times per period
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.frequency` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.frequency`

element.display: Event occurs up to frequencyMax times per period

target.display: Event occurs up to frequencyMax times per period
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.frequencyMax` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.frequencyMax`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.id`

element.display: Minutes from event (before or after)

target.display: Minutes from event (before or after)
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.offset` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.offset`

element.display: Event occurs frequency times per period

target.display: The duration to which the frequency applies. I.e. Event occurs frequency times per period
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.period` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.period`

element.display: Upper limit of period (3-4 hours)

target.display: Upper limit of period (3-4 hours)
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.periodMax` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.periodMax`

element.display: s | min | h | d | wk | mo | a - unit of time (UCUM)

target.display: s | min | h | d | wk | mo | a - unit of time (UCUM)
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.periodUnit` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.periodUnit` - periodUnit has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/units-of-time|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/units-of-time|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Time of day for action

target.display: Time of day for action
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.timeOfDay` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.timeOfDay`

element.display: Code for time period of occurrence

target.display: Code for time period of occurrence
target.comment: R4B `Timing.repeat.when` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Timing.repeat.when` - when has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/event-timing|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/event-timing|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
